content.p: Fill in the following chemical equation using the vocabulary from this section.

response.name: HHb
response.feedback: Correct. Hemoglobin that is not currently bound to an oxygen molecule is a reactant of this chemical equation

response.name: O2
response.feedback: Incorrect. Oxygen is already represented as a reactant in this equation.

response.name: HbO2
response.feedback: Incorrect. Oxyhemoglobin already has an oxygen bound to it and is the product of this reaction.

part.hint: In a chemical equation, the reactants go on the left hand side of the arrow and the product they form goes on the right hand side of the arrow.

response.name: HHb
response.feedback: Incorrect. Hemoglobin that is not currently bound to an oxygen molecule is a reactant of this chemical equation.

response.name: O2
response.feedback: Incorrect. Oxygen is already represented as a reactant in this equation.

response.name: HbO2
response.feedback: Correct. Oxyhemoglobin has an oxygen bound to it and is the product of this reaction.

part.hint: In a chemical equation, the reactants go on the left hand side of the arrow and the product they form goes on the right hand side of the arrow.
